The first version was released as a working beta in August 2006 â a [[GTK]]-based [[GUI]] for the newly developed [[bkisofs]] (a library for reading and writing ISO9660 files in [[user space]], including Joliet, RockRidge, and El Torito extensions).
â
In December 2007 version 1.3 has been ported to Windows. The Windows version is [[shareware]], while the Linux version is still distributed under the GPLv2. The two versions are functionally equivalent.
+
In December 2007 version 1.3 has been ported to Windows. The Windows version is [[shareware]], the only limitation is that it will work only for 15 days, beginning from the day of the installation, while the Linux version is still distributed under the GPLv2. The two versions are functionally equivalent.
